TopicTitle: Guys, What is the download size of the full version of KSP?

Articles.Content: I am planning to buy KSP and after playing lot's of the demo, my dad is wondering about the size of the download.
The download itself is Around 400MB. Installed it takes around 1.4Gb. Much less than most modern games today.
Thanks, my dad is now saying "Cool!" to me, LOL!
He should be more concerned if the computer can run it, not the size of it You can always delete some useless junk to make room, but you can't just download a new computer to run it!
I have a good card in my Dell, i got ram and stuff, The demo runs lag free on my computer.
Wait till you get up in the 500+ parts. Then see if it can handle it..
If the game runs lag free it should run well on the full version too.

Note that the game will expand as development proceeds, but if you buy over Steam then Steam will do incremental updates (only downloading new or changed files) and we should, before too long, be getting a patcher that will also only download new or changed files.
remember there's still people who are bandwidth restricted to a maximum amount per day/week/month, so download size can indeed be a deal breaker for people.
